short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SimplifyLaw helps you understand hard to read legal texts such as laws or even Terms and Conditions of your favourite product, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you would like to support my work further, feel free to buy me a coffee: https://buymeacoffee.com/vkabadzhova

SimplifyLaw helps you understand complex legal texts such as laws, terms and conditions, and other legal documents, including PDFs. Select the text you're interested in, right click and choose "Explain with SimplifyLaw", see the simplified text without needing a legal background.

It's also open source! Feel free to upload your own OpenAI key:)

*Disclaimer: SimplifyLaw is intended as an informational tool only, and does not constitute legal advice. Always consult with an attorney for advice regarding your specific situation.
